record.field: SELECT Id, Name, Supplier_Category__c, Supplier_Status__c, Account_Level__c, LastModifiedDate, BillingCountry, BillingState, BillingAddress, BillingStreet, Phone, Fax, Area_of_expertise__c, Sharepoint_Folder__c, Phone, Fax, Area_of_expertise__c, Sharepoint_Folder__c, Sharepoint_ID__c, Supplier_Description__c, Key_Information__c, Project_Assistant__c, Supplier_Selection_Form_completed__c, Website, Create_Sharepoint_Folder__c, OwnerId, Is_supplier__c, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, Supplier__c, Type, Project_Controller__c, VCLS_Alt_Name__c, Supplier_Project__c, Activity__c, Product_Type__c, Industry, KimbleOne__InvoicingCurrencyIsoCode__c, Invoice_Administrator__c FROM Account WHERE ((Supplier__c = True or Is_supplier__c = True) or (Project_Controller__c != null and VCLS_Alt_Name__c != null))
